title: "Saaf Water platform using IoT sensors, AI wins $200K prize"
excerpt: "About 2 billion people around the world lack access to safely-managed drinking water, and an India-based organization with a technology platform leveraging sensors and AI just won $200,000 in a global coding competition to do something about it."
